search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Big Cartel (bigcartel.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Big Cartel can be found here: [https://www.bigcartel.com/pricing](https://www.bigcartel.com/pricing).

extracted_content.content:
Big Cartel Pricing & Plans - No Hidden Fees & Free Sites Available!
===============

[Got Goals to Sell Online in 2025? Save 20% With an Annual Plan!](https://www.bigcartel.com/product/pricing)

[](https://www.bigcartel.com/)

Choose a plan that’s right for you
==================================

Trusted by small businesses all over the world. No listing fees, hidden fees, or unnecessary data sharing practices.

MonthlyAnnually (Save 20%)

Free

Free

### Gold

$0/mo$0/mo

$0/mo$0/mo

The basics of everything you need to sell online and in-person.

FOREVER FREE

FOREVER FREE

[Select](https://my.bigcartel.com/signup/gold)

HIDESHOW

GOLD FEATURES

Sell your products
------------------

*   5 product listings
*   1 image per product
*   Product variant groups

Manage your business
--------------------

*   Sell online
*   Accept cards, PayPal, and more
*   Mobile apps for iOS & Android
*   Sales tax autopilot
*   Import products from Etsy, Squarespace, & Shopify

Customize your store
--------------------

*   Free, SEO-optimized templates

Track performance
-----------------

*   Real-time sales dashboard

Save 20%

Pay monthly

### Platinum

$15/mo$12/mo

$12/mo$15/mo

For a growing business with more inventory and shipments to manage.

BILLED $180 $144 ANNUALLY

OR SAVE 20% ANNUALLY

[Select](https://my.bigcartel.com/signup/platinum?frequency=monthly)

HIDESHOW

PLATINUM FEATURES

Sell your products
------------------

*   50 product listings
*   5 images per product
*   Product variant groups

Manage your business
--------------------

*   Sell online & in person
*   Accept cards, PayPal, Afterpay, and more
*   Offer discounts & run promos
*   Unlimited label printing + up to 90% off shipping
*   Shipment tracking
*   Mobile apps for iOS & Android
*   Sales tax autopilot
*   Inventory tracking
*   Bulk editing
*   Easy-install apps for print-on-demand, product reviews, & more
*   Ads support for Google, Facebook, and more
*   Import products from Etsy, Squarespace, & Shopify

Customize your store
--------------------

*   Use a custom domain
*   Free, SEO-optimized templates
*   Advanced template customization

Track performance
-----------------

*   Real-time sales dashboard
*   Google Analytics

Save 20%

Pay monthly

### Diamond

$30/mo$24/mo

$24/mo$30/mo

The support you need for your scaling business with over 50 products ready to go.

BILLED $360 $288 ANNUALLY

OR SAVE 20% ANNUALLY

HIDESHOW

DIAMOND FEATURES

Sell your products
------------------

*   500 product listings
*   25 images per product
*   Product variant groups

Manage your business
--------------------

*   Sell online & in person

*   Offer discounts & run promos
*   Unlimited label printing + up to 90% off shipping
*   Shipment tracking
*   Mobile apps for iOS & Android
*   Sales tax autopilot
*   Inventory tracking
*   Bulk editing
*   Easy-install apps for print-on-demand, product reviews, & more
*   Ads with audience targeting for Google, Facebook and more
*   Import products from Etsy, Squarespace, & Shopify
*   Prioritized support
*   Abandoned cart recovery

Customize your store
--------------------

*   Use a custom domain
*   Free, SEO-optimized templates
*   Advanced template customization

Track performance
-----------------

*   Real-time sales dashboard
*   Advanced Google Analytics reporting

Big Cartel has a pricing plan to fit your budget (including a free website builder!). Flat monthly rate, no cut of your sales, and change your plan anytime!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer a 20% discount compared to monthly billing.
